comment._content: this one breaks my heart. look at him with his sweet dog...

comment.author: 66847065@N00
comment._content: Age and loyalty. Poverty strikes disproportionately  to the aged but they will not deny the companionship of the non judgmental friend.

comment.author: 23185247@N04
comment._content: While the photo says "beggar" A few other things to note---the even lengths of cord hanging over the man's arm and from the dog's collar. Shoelaces perhaps?  It would seems he's trying to make his living however humble the circumstances.

comment.author: 37582170@N00
comment._content:
Looks like he's selling belts.

And yes, heartbreaking.
